This is a story when I first entered the workforce right out of university. Idk why the arrows don't show so I'll use dashes.

-be 22, no job prospects so I work in the mall folding clothes
-indian man walks in
-hi sir! welcome to GAP. if you need anything feel free to ask
-he leaves and comes back later with the clothes he wants to buy
-him and coworker are arguing at the register
-coworker calls manager
-i step a little closer to hear what's going on
-indian: this shirt is dirty look
-manager: i am so sorry about that. we try to keep our store and merchandise as clean as possible but some customers still damage our clothing. can i get you another shirt?
-coworker: we dont have any more in that size.
-manager: im sorry about that sir. youll have to order online
-indian: its ok. just give me a discount and ill buy it.
-manager: im sorry sir. for legal and health reasons, we need to take that shirt back and dispose it.
-indian: what? why? just give me a discount.
-manager tries to explain that he doesnt want the man to get sick if the stain is from bodily fluids because the man can later sue.
-indian man insists on being given a discount
-finally manager asks the man to leave
-indian man wants managers info so he can report him to corporate
-manager gives man info
-indian man threatens a 1 star review on yelp and leaves

indians are notorious for these kinds of antics. theyll tear a tiny hole in clothing or mark it with a pen so they can get a discount. theyre as cheap as kikes. they pride themselves in owning 2 pairs of pants and 4 shirts and a pair of sandals. that is part of the reason why they stink like shit besides not bathing and eating too much curry.

what was the stain you ask? it looked like a small shit stain. yes i believe the indian son of a bitch took the shirt and wiped his ass with it and complained. i wouldnt be surprised if he did that since india is a dirty fucking country where they openly defecate in the streets and bathe in the river ghandi with corpses, shit and trash inside.

Liberals are whiny little bitches. Everything is an oppression contest with them. Feminists are starting to hate transfags for pretending to be women and getting more attention than them.
